data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Token Pack 30 - Constructs
data.detailed_description:
Jans Token Pack 30 - Constructs

Modrons are interesting creatures. Where angels and demons are representations of Good and Evil, the Modrons are representatives of pure order. It is often confusing to try and understand what they want, but they act with purpose and dedication.
Gnome tinkerers have created all kinds of interesting constructs. Some of them are just toys, but others can be very dangerous.
Tokens included are:
  • Monodrone
  • Duodrone
  • Tridrone
  • Quadrone
  • Pentadrone
  • Bronze Scout
  • Vox Seeker
  • Stone Defender
  • Oaken Bolter
  • Flesh Golem
  • Iron Cobra
  • Shield Guardian
  • Clay Golem
  • Stone Golem
  • Iron Golem
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jan Loos

It is often confusing to try and understand what they want, but they act with purpose and dedication.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
